/* com.innobiz.orange.web.pt.dao.PtPltSetupRDao.selectPtPltSetupR */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'PLT_ZONE_CD' AND CD = M.PLT_ZONE_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) PLT_ZONE_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM,
FROM ( SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
TOP (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy}N.MNU_GRP_ID DESC, N.PLT_ID DESC) AS RNUM, N.* FROM (SELECT
T.MNU_GRP_ID, T.PLT_ID, T.PLT_ZONE_CD, T.RESC_ID, T.SORT_ORDR, T.TOP_PX, T.LEFT_PX, T.WDTH_PX, T.HGHT_PX, T.ZIDX,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'PLT_ZONE_CD' AND CD = T.PLT_ZONE_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) PLT_ZONE_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM,
FROM PT_PLT_SETUP_R T
AND T.MNU_GRP_ID = #{mnuGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.PLT_ID = #{pltId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.MNU_GRP_ID, T.PLT_ID
) N ) M WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
